### INSTALL ###

IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/threadpool-0_2_5-src)
	DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
	##DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/Tools/threadpool-0_2_5-src.zip)
	DKDOWNLOAD(https://sourceforge.net/projects/threadpool/files/threadpool/0.2.5%20%28Stable%29/threadpool-0_2_5-src.zip)
	##DKRENAME(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/download ${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/threadpool-0_2_5-src.zip)
	DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/threadpool-0_2_5-src.zip ${3RDPARTY})
ENDIF()

##DKINSTALL(${DKWEB}/Download/Libs/threadpool-0_2_5-src.zip threadpool-0_2_5-src)
DKSET(THREADPOOL ${3RDPARTY}/threadpool-0_2_5-src)


### LINK ###
DKINCLUDE(${THREADPOOL})


### COMPILE ###
